item.title: UAI 2024 Oral Session 3: Causality
item.description:
Description

Towards Bounding Causal Effects under Markov Equivalence Alexis Bellot https://openreview.net/pdf?id=xY33abx46a

Targeted Reduction of Causal Models Armin Kekić, Bernhard Schölkopf, Michel Besserve https://openreview.net/pdf?id=CFHpI53xmb

Characterising Interventions in Causal Games Manuj Mishra, James Fox, Michael J. Wooldridge https://openreview.net/pdf?id=MXwg8dYBFd

Causally Abstracted Multi-armed Bandits Fabio Massimo Zennaro, Nicholas George Bishop, Joel Dyer, Yorgos Felekis, Ani Calinescu, Michael J. Wooldridge, Theodoros Damoulas https://openreview.net/pdf?id=Uxrxz4X416
item.dc:creator: Alexis Bellot
